item.title: MIUI OS2.0.100.0.VNCINXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 India
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 India

Codename: houji

Version: OS2.0.100.0.VNCINXM | 15.0

Size: 6.2 GB

MD5: 06a073c329b323022352c17e25da29ae

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[System]
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Control center]
New: Flashlight brightness adjustment page
New: Certain devices now support adjustable flashlight brightness
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[Gallery]
Optimization: Display layouts for Gallery items
Optimization: Gallery now supports deleting and hiding items via long pressing
Optimization: Search results for time and location keywords
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
